message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers.
Time is ticking, we're both losing money. I'll meet you closer to the middle, 52/48.
Come on, I'm willing to compromise too. 57-43 is a good deal.
This is getting ridiculous.  I'll take a smaller cut to end this. 51/49.
